SEARCH
Package manager

Class CurrentMenuController

java.lang.Object
manager.CurrentMenuController
public class CurrentMenuController extends Object
Manager view for current menu - see items, tweak price/stock, toggle active, add/delete items. Loads data async, updates JavaFX table on the UI thread.
Author:
Akil Daresalamwala

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    CurrentMenuController.ItemView
    Simple item view model for the current menu table (id, name, stock, cost, category, active).
